attributes.action: Add 'Climate Label Ranking' to Food Packaging to Show the Environmental Impacts
attributes.additional_details: Having a colour coded score system e.g: 1-5 of environmental impact (co2 produced, water used etc) would make choosing eco-friendly options would be quick and easy.
attributes.background: With climate change, such a crucial topic, many people want to do the best they can to help reduce their carbon footprint and their impact on the planet, but it can be difficult to know which foods are detrimental for the environment without doing huge amounts of research before your food shop.
